user_id.description: The username of the profile owner.

onlineStatus.description: Indicates whether the user is currently online.

profilePicture.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

myScorecards.description: List of scorecard ids created by the user.

otherScorecards.description: List of scorecard ids associated with the user.

groups.description: List of group ids the user is a member of.

settings_id.description: The id of the user's settings document.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the profile was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the profile was last updated.
